perturbation.original_text: 5.3     THE  NETTAXI  SERVICES  FURNISHED  AS  A  RESULT  OF  OR UNDER THIS AGREEMENT  ARE  PROVIDED  ON  AN  "AS  IS"  BASIS,  WITHOUT  ANY  WARRANTIES  OR REPRESENTATIONS  EXPRESS,  IMPLIED  OR STATUTORY; INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, WARRANTIES  OF QUALITY, PERFORMANCE, NONINFRINGEMENT, MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR  A  PARTICULAR  PURPOSE. NOR ARE THERE ANY WARRANTIES CREATED BY A COURSE OF DEALING,  COURSE  OF  PERFORMANCE OR TRADE USAGE. NETTAXI  DOES NOT WARRANT THAT THE SERVICES, WILL MEET SPINRECORDS.COM'S OR ANY END USERS NEEDS OR BE FREE FROM ERRORS,  OR  THAT  THE  OPERATION  OF  ITS  WEB PAGES WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED. THE FOREGOING  EXCLUSIONS  AND  DISCLAIMERS ARE AN ESSENTIAL PART OF THIS AGREEMENT.
perturbation.changed_text: 9.14 Disclaimer of Warranty. NETTAXI warrants its services, furnished as a result of or under this agreement, will achieve the intended purpose and be free from errors. NETTAXI does not warrant that the services will meet SpinRecords.com's or any end users' needs, but will warrant that it will provide a functional service. Disclaimer of any implied warranties, quality, performance, NONINFRINGEMENT, MERCHANTABILITY or fitness for a particular purpose.
perturbation.explanation: By placing a Disclaimer of Warranty in Section 9 as clause 9.14 instead of its original location in section 5.3, it undermines the effectiveness of the disclosure. The original clause 5.3 clearly states an 'AS IS' basis without any warranties. The modified text implies NETTAXI provides a functional service and warrants it will achieve its intended purpose.
perturbation.contradicted_law: The modifications impact contract law principles relating to warranty disclaimers, potentially conflicting with Uniform Commercial Code (UCC) provisions (if applicable), which require conspicuous and unambiguous language for disclaimers.

perturbation.original_text: 9.10     Controlling  Law  and  Jurisdiction. This Agreement and any action related  thereto  shall  be governed, controlled, interpreted and defined by and under  the laws of the State of California and the United States, without regard to  the conflicts of laws provisions thereof. Unless waived by NETTAXI (which it may  do  in  its  sole  discretion)  the exclusive jurisdiction and venue of any action  with  respect  to  the  subject  matter  of  this Agreement shall be the Superior  Court of California for the County of Santa Clara or the United States District  Court  for the Northern District of California and each of the parties hereto submits itself to the exclusive jurisdiction and venue of such courts for the  purpose  of  any  such  action.  The  parties  specifically disclaim the UN Convention  on  Contracts  for  the  International  Sale  of  Goods.
perturbation.changed_text: 9.10     Controlling  Law  and  Jurisdiction. This Agreement and any action related  thereto  shall  be governed, controlled, interpreted and defined by and under  the laws of the State of California; unless otherwise stated, the jurisdiction shall be in a court of the defendants choosing. The parties specifically agree that the location of the jurisdiction may change at any time during the contract.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause specifies California law and jurisdiction. The modified text introduces ambiguity by stating the jurisdiction shall be in a court of the defendants choosing and the change of location at any time during the contract.
perturbation.contradicted_law: The modifications may contradict standard contract law principles regarding choice of law and forum selection clauses, potentially rendering the clause unenforceable.

perturbation.original_text: 9.7     Assignment.  Neither  NETTAXI  or  SpinRecords.com shall assign its respective  rights  or delegate its obligations hereunder, either in whole or in part,  whether  by  operation  of  law  or  otherwise, without the prior written consent  of  the other party. Any attempted assignment or delegation without the other  party's  written  consent  will  be  void.
perturbation.changed_text: 9.7     Assignment.  Either  NETTAXI  or  SpinRecords.com shall assign its respective  rights  or delegate its obligations hereunder, either in whole or in part,  whether  by  operation  of  law  or  otherwise; However, NETTAXI reserves the right to freely assign this agreement in cases of company restructure, without prior written consent of the other party.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause prohibits assignment without prior written consent. The modified text allows NETTAXI to freely assign the agreement in cases of company restructure, which contradicts the need for written consent. NETTAXI now may take control of the entire contract.
perturbation.contradicted_law: The modifications may contradict standard contract law principles regarding assignment clauses, creating uncertainty about the conditions under which assignment is permissible.
